Title: Requires the coverage of alternative treatment options by the medical assistance program and private insurers
Summary: Requires that non-pharmaceutical alternative treatment options including but not limited to treatment provided by a licensed acupuncturist, licensed massage therapist, licensed chiropractor, and yoga instructor be covered by the medical assistance program and by private health insurers.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; add §365-o, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the social services law, in relation to requiring the coverage of alternate treatment options by the medical assistance program and private health insurers
